property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: You gain 2 life. −1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn. −6: Create a white Avatar creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Until that day I cursed the angels, those uncaring lights in the sky. They rewarded my scorn with the gift of time, every year of which I've spent in devotion to their names." - Torian Sha, soul warden

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Plains you control and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The meadow sprang up beneath me, and I perceived a path from our people's defeat to our highest glory."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike, lifelink, protection from Demons and from Dragons

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some angels protect the meek and innocent. Others seek out and smite evil wherever it lurks.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I carry the light of truth. Do not pity those it blinds, for they never had eyes to see."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance. When Captain of the Watch enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target black or red permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We see clearly the error of your ways. It does not matter that you choose not to." - Urien of the Lightwielders

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Giants and pit spawn attempted to topple the cathedral's pillars. The fine grit of their remains still swirls in the breeze outside.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our law prohibits capital punishment. We believe even the gravest offenders have the chance to redeem themselves." - Torian Sha, soul warden

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One's blade is only as sharp as one's conviction." - Ajani Goldmane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying If a source an opponent controls would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her gaze prevents the petty sins and her sword punishes the rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to any target instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even when fate is already written, there's always time to change the names.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Born under the sun, the first child will seek the foundation of honor and be fortified by its righteousness." - Codex of the Constellari

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Together the soldiers were like a golden blade, cutting down their enemies and scarring the darkness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant permanent Enchanted permanent has indestructible. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy that permanent. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spoils of war are not measured only in gold and silver.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Whenever Lightwielder Paladin deals combat damage to a player, you may exile target black or red permanent that player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She shepherds mysteries and dust as others would a flock of sheep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards to the battlefield under their owners' control. (Auras with nothing to enchant remain in graveyards.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the vaults are empty, everyone is rich.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Palace Guard can block any number of creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm not nearly as bothered by being outnumbered as I am by their foul stench."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a meteor, it strikes from above without warning. Unlike a meteor, it then carries you off and eats you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Other Soldier creatures you control have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the rhoxes charge, everyone else knows which way to run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the greatest strength is the strength of conviction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With one flap of her wings, the angel beat back the fires of war.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Defending the citadel is easy. I just take these big fellows outside the main gate and let the enemy take a good long look." - Mastodon keeper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponents can't cast spells this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the wizardry in the world has to pass through one small and easily sealed door." - Ajani Goldmane

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunters of every species on the savannah, silvercoats disdain camouflage in favor of total dominance of the food chain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A relic donation is suggested." "The suggestion is mandatory." - Temple signs

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At summer's end, the pegasus herd stampedes across the sky. Their silent footfalls taunt the clouds and bid the rains to come." - Stormfront fable

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let everything return to its true nature, so that destiny may take its course."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, {T}: Exile target Skeleton, Vampire, or Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My motive is not vengeance but mercy. I deliver the soulless back to their severed souls."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Soldier creatures you control get +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Courage is a proud and gleaming shield. It does not bend or hide from sight. To fight with courage, we must forge in steel."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Truth is a straight, keen edge. There are no soft angles or rounded edges. To fight for truth, we must forge in steel."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {W}: Wall of Faith gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is a fine suit, armorsmith. I will be safe from harm. If only you could forge rings to mail the rest of my people . . ." - Lord Hilneth

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The East Wind, an interloper in the dominions of Westerly Weather, is an impassive-faced tyrant with a sharp poniard held behind his back for a treacherous stab." - Joseph Conrad, The Mirror of the Sea

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The ground polluted floats with human gore, And human carnage taints the dreadful shore Fly swift the dangerous coast: let every ear Be stopp'd against the song! 'tis death to hear!" - Homer, The Odyssey, trans. Pope

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shapeshifter mimics with a twin's esteem and a mirror's cruelty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land As Convincing Mirage enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Enchanted land is the chosen type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where are we? You must learn to ask more useful questions than that."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merfolk are best known for their subtle magic. But those who try to fight them in their own territory quickly realize that merfolk are hardly defenseless on the field of battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -7/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it has a brain, even a primitive one, we can most surely scramble it." - Garild, merfolk mage

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you." - Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Djinn of Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it. {2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from Djinn of Wishes: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some wizards compete not to summon the most interesting creatures, but to create the most interesting aftereffects when a summons goes awry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm one masterpiece away from ruling this pathetic world." - Saldrath, master artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target red or green spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your downfall was not your ignorance, your weakness, or your hubris, but your warm blood." - Heidar, Rimewind master

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, each other player copies that spell. Each of those players may choose new targets for their copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All consciousness is one, separated only by a thin veil of the physical." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's a mistake to say turtles hide in their shells. They merely need time to contemplate how best to bite your head off.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy Ice Cage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Illusionary Servant becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Illusion is a handy but fragile medium. Use it only in a pinch, or against the dim-witted." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Each player draws a card. −1: Target player draws a card. −1[0]: Target player mills twenty cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Humanity has always envied the power of flight. So we took it." - Scytha, aeromage

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The horses of Scytha's army must be well trained. A thrown rider would fall miles before meeting the ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Target Merfolk creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sharks envy our ferocity. The eels envy our cunning."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why fight the body when you can dominate the mind that rules it?" - Jace Beleren

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fragments of thought refract and multiply, surging in a geyser of dizzying insight.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The construction of a defense is not accomplished by adding bricks." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some owls house the souls of archmages of ages past.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Serpent of the Endless Sea's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Islands you control. Serpent of the Endless Sea can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious." - Garild, merfolk mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Foul-tempered, poorly trained, and mule-stubborn, the drake is the perfect test of the master's will.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Sphinx Ambassador deals combat damage to a player, search that player's library for a card, then that player chooses a card name. If you searched for a creature card that doesn't have that name, you may put it onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most disappointing thing about learning telepathy is finding out how boring people really are." - Teferi, fourth-level student

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just when you thought you'd survived the first wave.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Genius is overrated, especially when it's someone else's.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player mills half their library, rounded down.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The educated mind is heavy with lore and knowledge. It's also the most likely to collapse under its own weight." - Ambassador Laquatus

property.name: Rules
property.value: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Imitation is the most dangerous form of flattery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mages routinely summon creatures from the Æther. It's only fair that they occasionally throw one back.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I welcome it. The pasture is cleared of weeds and the wolves are frozen solid." - Lumi, goatherd

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A smaller cousin to the dragon, drakes are often seen at the side of powerful wizards who use them as airborne eyes and ears.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've never understood why so many beings lumber around on the ground. There are three dimensions, yet they use only two."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like all priests, she gives her blessings only to those truly worthy of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is how wars are won - not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed." - Yurin, royal assassin

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She died in this swamp, and so will you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1. {2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A vampire enacts vengeance on the entire world, claiming her debt two tiny pinpricks at a time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spend only black mana on X. Consume Spirit deals X damage to any target and you gain X life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target green or white creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the noblest of intentions and strongest of wills inevitably crumble into dust.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wise always keep an ear open to the whispers of power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stop complaining. You can rest when you're dead. Oh - sorry." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dread Warlock can't be blocked except by black creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't know who to pity more: those who flee from my presence or the damned who can withstand it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, never surrender, and don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off." - Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oddly, no one questioned the Cabal's wisdom in hiring a zombie to work at the cemetery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard other than basic land cards. For each card exiled this way, search that player's library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Howling Banshee enters the battlefield, each player loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Villagers cloaked the town in magical silence, but their ears still bled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Hypnotic Specter deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its victims are known by their eyes: shattered vessels leaking broken dreams.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The nesting bats of Kelinore sleep soundly while the sun passes, nestled among their grisly collections.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Target player discards a card. −2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. −8: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its form never rests, propelled by some undetectable gale from beyond the gloom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a vicious circle. Stress breeds pain. Pain breeds stress. It's simply beautiful, wouldn't you agree?" - Vradeen, vampire nocturnus

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The beauty of mental attacks is that your victims never remember them." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards X cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dark thoughts hatch and twist within the mind, straining to take wing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats. A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is no excuse for disobedience." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trained in the arts of stealth, royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blood is constant. Every drop I drink, someone must bleed." - Vradeen, vampire nocturnus

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know I accept only one currency here, and yet you have sought me out. Why now do you hesitate?" - Xathrid demon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether the end comes swift or slow, it always comes too soon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the drowsy dark cave of the mind, dreams build their nest with fragments dropped from day's caravan." - Rabindranath Tagore

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Born under the moon, the second child will stumble on temptation and seek power in the dark places of the heart." - Codex of the Constellari

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Vampire Aristocrat gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I admit, I am a creature of the city. The sights, the nightly excitement, the abundance of fine drink . . ."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is black, Vampire Nocturnus and other Vampire creatures you control get +2/+1 and have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your life will set with the sun."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {B}: Regenerate Wall of Bone. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The battle was over, but the carnage continued for days.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For strength to have any meaning, there must also be . . . you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Xathrid Demon, then each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power. If you can't sacrifice a creature, tap Xathrid Demon and you lose 7 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Phirax of Blood Ridge has sent a war giant at us? What, do I have to spell it out for you? Kill the giant, scoop out its skull, and drive it back to Blood Ridge. Honestly, what kind of necromancer minions are you?" - Keren-Dur, necromancer lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison." - Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Berserkers of Blood Ridge attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They take a blood oath to die in battle. So far none have failed to fulfill the promise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player draws three cards, then discards three cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jariad burned the midnight oil, burned through scroll after scroll, and then burned down his laboratory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn. (They can attack and {T} even if they just came under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Great generals inspire by example. Goblin chieftains inspire by electrifying the barracks.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side." "Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?" "Yes." "So shouldn't we - " "No."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target nonland permanent you control and up to two target nonland permanents you don't control. Destroy one of them at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You wish for great destruction? It is done, my master."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. −X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature. −8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They fell screaming into the depths of the chasm like so many pebbles tossed down a well.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a barbarian army has conquered a region, their shamans summon hellhounds that keep undesirables out and prisoners in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mage breathed in life-giving air and breathed out death-bringing fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Goblin Artillery deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most goblins get their turn firing the catapult, but few achieve the coveted title of Ammunition Holder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 and have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are goblinkind, heirs to the mountain empires of chieftains past. Rest is death to us, and arson is our call to war."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ignite Disorder deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target white and/or blue creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shaman prowled the academy halls, shaking his head at the pomp and babble of the sages inside. He knew just the spell to liven the place up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Inferno Elemental blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Inferno Elemental deals 3 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who wish to invade our monastery, please take it up with my servant." - Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jackal Familiar can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the gray-hairs keep their ravens and drakes. My familiar will be a reflection of me: bloodthirsty, with a predator's instinct." - Taivang, barbarian warlord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage is a dangerous weapon. Your enemies will try to use your anger against you. Use it against them first." - Ajani Goldmane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sparkmage shrieked, calling on the rage of the storms of his youth. To his surprise, the sky responded with a fierce energy he'd never thought to see again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A flash of the lightning, a break of the wave, He passes from life to his rest in the grave." - William Knox, "Mortality"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Magma Phoenix dies, it deals 3 damage to each creature and each player. {3}{R}{R}: Return Magma Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't know why people say a double-edged sword is bad. It's a sword. With two edges." - Kamahl, pit fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do they see in the throes of panic? I'm not sure I want to know." - Kezim, prodigal pyromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prodigal Pyromancer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What am I looking at? Ashes, dead man."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who'd want to ignite things one at a time?" - Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life up here is simple. Adapt to the ways of the mountains and they will reward you. Fight them and they will end you." - Kezim, prodigal pyromancer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Days of planning. Weeks of building. Months of perfecting. Seconds of smashing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sparkmage Apprentice enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sparkmages are performance artists of sorts, but pain is the price of admission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than Stone Giant's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A typical day for a giant. A momentous event for a goat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack. They need signals to tell them when to stop.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Viashino lack the majesty of their draconic ancestors, but they lash out with equal rage and twice the spite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mercy is for those who keep their distance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles all permanents they own into their library, then reveals that many cards from the top of their library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mapmaker scowled. He sighed, unrolled his parchment, and painted a large black blob where the Eternal Meadow was once marked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kill the queen first, or we'll be fighting her drones forever. It is not in a queen's nature to have enough servants." - Borzard, exterminator captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Awakener Druid enters the battlefield, target Forest becomes a 4/5 green Treefolk creature for as long as Awakener Druid remains on the battlefield. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The druids of Mazar treat each seedcone with respect for the warrior it will become.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each feather in its tail is a souvenir of an exotic land, a memory condensed in hue.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Borderland Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 1 life for each land you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Following the sun's cycle, harvest season comes once a year - unless the druids bid the sun behave otherwise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Bramble Creeper attacks, it gets +5/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen the fully grown ones tear a baloth to gory ribbons in seconds." - Kivi, thornberry harvester

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind." - Ramal, sage of Westgate

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most terrifying thing about the craw wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Regenerate Cudgel Troll. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He knows the name of every elf born in the last four centuries. More importantly, they all know his.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more. - Elvish teaching

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before any major undertaking, a Cylian elf seeks the guidance of a visionary to learn the will of the gargantuan ancients.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the oryx dies, its flesh returns to the earth, but its emerald bones remain as a tribute to the forest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its diet consists of fruits, plants, small woodland animals, large woodland animals, woodlands, fruit groves, fruit farmers, and small cities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant tapped creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every living thing has roots in nature. Sometimes nature gets its roots into you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else." - Lord Hilneth

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Untap two target lands. −1: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. −4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant spider's silk naturally resists gravity, almost weaving itself as it blankets the forest canopy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Protection from blue and from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything blue or black.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token for each Forest you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The murderous horrors of Raven's Run are legendary, but even that haunted place goes quiet when the night wolves howl.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not fire upon it - it is bad luck. And a waste of arrows." - Alera Benath, Kalonian ranger

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. - Llanowar penalty for trespassing

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, you may put that card on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All are prey to the eyes of the wild.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. {T}: Tap all untapped Wolf creatures you control. Each Wolf tapped this way deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power divided as its controller chooses among any number of those Wolves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: May your weapon be no sword forged. May your armor be no metal wrought. - Elvish saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't claim to hunt all creatures. There are some things in the jungle that simply can't be hunted." - Garruk Wildspeaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a blue or black spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Mold Adder.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more you struggle against its coils, the tighter they get.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you want to destroy something lifeless, make it live.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like nature, the fern spirals back on itself, eternally seeking its own center.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the beast cloaks itself in the mighty oak, what good is a bow? When the oak wraps itself around the snarling beast, what good is a hatchet?" - Dionus, elvish archdruid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The desire for its magic horn inspires such bloodthirsty greed that all who see the unicorn will kill to possess it." - Dionus, elvish archdruid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protean Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Protean Hydra, prevent that damage and remove that many +1/+1 counters from it. Whenever a +1/+1 counter is removed from Protean Hydra, put two +1/+1 counters on it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Regenerate target creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This wound shall be like the chills of winter: swiftly forgotten when spring shoots rise."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bears aren't always as strong and as mean as you imagine. Some are even stronger and meaner.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes I wonder if our weapons and armor are a step backward." - Soron, rhox pikemaster

property.name: Rules
property.value: Windstorm deals X damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We don't like interlopers and thieves cluttering our skies." - Dionus, elvish archdruid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If taken, it cuts the hand that clutches it. If given, it heals the hand that holds it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A banner for bonds of blood or belief.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, indestructible If Darksteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Darksteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though no longer attached to the hand, it still holds its adversary in its grasp.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mine's riches never end, nor do the moans of the spirits doomed to haunt them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bright as a mirror, dark as the sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+4 and loses flying. Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to equipped creature. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Mirror of Fate: Choose up to seven face-up exiled cards you own. Exile all the cards from your library, then put the chosen cards on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the glass shattered, forgotten realities and dead memories came flooding back.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Regardless of the century, plane, or species, developing artificers never fail to invent the ornithopter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, choose a card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In its heart lies the secret of immortality.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My masterpiece is complete - and so shall be my triumph." - Saldrath, master artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have no maximum hand size.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything the wise woman learned she wrote in a book, and when the pages were black with ink, she took white ink and began again." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature can't be blocked and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {2}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A wurm knows nothing of deception. If it opens its mouth, it plans to eat you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Gargoyle Castle: Create a 3/4 colorless Gargoyle artifact creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most knew of the tower's wizard and gargoyle. Few realized which was guardian and which was master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
